plotBart 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Calculate propensity scores using BART

    propensity_scores.Rd

    Calculates propensity scores using Bayesian Additive Regression Trees via bartCause::bartc.

    propensity_scores(.data, treatment, response, confounders)

    Arguments

    .data

    dataframe

    treatment

    character. Name of the treatment column within .data

    response

    character. Name of the response column within .data

    confounders

    character list of column names denoting confounders within .data

    Value

    a numeric vector of propensity scores

    See also

    plot_overlap_pScores rpart.plot

    Examples

    data(lalonde)
propensity_scores(
  .data = lalonde,
  treatment = 'treat',
  response = 're78',
  confounders = c('age', 'educ')
)
